newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: CZECH CBANK TWO-WK REV REPO YIELD 39 PCT.
newsitem.headline: CZECH CBANK TWO-WK REV REPO YIELD 39 PCT.

text.p: Average yield in a Czech National Bank's (CNB) two-week reverse repo tender draining liquidity from the market on Wednesday reached the limit rate of 39 percent, the CNB said.
The central bank had been offering maximum yields of 75 percent in its one-week tenders over the last two weeks in order to help the crown resist speculative attacks.
It was the first operation of such a maturity since the central bank raised rates to support the crown.
The wave of selling forced the CNB to float the crown last Monday, which resulted in an immediate eight percent drop in the currency's value.
